resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
You need to grant write permission to store downloaded files!

Mora Mora is in very early development still. The present version only contains one single example lesson (fr-de) you can use to learn that language.

 You can still use Mora Mora to create your own lessons and share them through your own nextcloud storage cloud. If you want to share your lessons with the world, please contact the team: mora.mora@gmx.net.

 Use the scroll view to select the language you want to learn. In the top right corner you can select the language you already know good enough e.g. your mother tongue. This is the language the dialogs will be translated into.

 You can click on "Editing mode" in the drawer you just closed to add more languages and thereby contribute to enlarge the content data of Mora Mora.

 The source code of Mora Mora can be found under: https://github.com/hendric-git/mora-mora

There was a problem when trying to install the downloaded apk file. Please try to install the new Mora Mora version manually.

 Use your preferred file explorer and open the location:
\n Device storage -> MoraMora -> temporary 

 and click on the apk file to finish the installation process.

Mora Mora is in very early development still. The present version does not contain any lessons you can use to learn languages.

 This is where you offline lessons are available. There are stored on your device. If you haven't downloaded any lessons yet you can create your own by opening the drawer and clicking on - Editing mode - . With the help of the appearing buttons you can create a new topic.

 You can also try to find lessons online. Use the drawer and click on - Login - .

Mora Mora is in very early development still. The present version almost does not contain any lessons you can use to learn languages.

 You can create lessons using Mora Mora and share them by contacting the team under: mora.mora@gmx.net

 There is also a telegram chat group Mora-Mora.

 The source code of the application as well as the most recent binary are available at: https://github.com/hendric-git/mora-mora

The custom cloud is your own nextcloud cloud or the cloud of someone who gave you the credentials. Currently only the nextcloud interface is implemented so no other cloud storage providers are supported. You can get free cloud storage from several nextcloud providers.

The default cloud is the main repository for language lessons. You only have read access to it, so you won\'t be able to change the content or add your own lessons. Right now almost no lessons are present.
This gives the world access to your custom cloud. An access token of your cloud will be stored in the default cloud. Make sure that you don\'t have any sensible data stored on that cloud
After creating a nextcloud storage account the provider will give you an URL like:\n\nhttps://yourusername.nextcloud.de
The user name of you nextcloud account.
The password of your nextcloud storage account. That password won\'t be stored but the access token (one way hash of your user name and password).
When you create a lesson an author name is automatically added. You can leave that blank or set a name in case you want some feedback from other users.
This is the background viisible throughout your a√©ntire application

"Use the buttons to answer the questions!

 You can tap on the bubbles to view the translations

 In order to replay the media tap in the pictures

 In Edit lesson mode you can long-tap the bubbles in order to change the content."
That functionality is under development still!

Use the following for the cloud login:
After pressing that button all lessons stored on your device will be deleted an the default lessons will be restored.

Using the + buttons you can add supplemental speech bubbles for the computer and the user respectively.

 If you want to remove the last bubble use the - Button.

 In order to change the content of the bubbles, the picture or the video to show tap long on the bubbles. A dialog will appear where you can modify what you like to.
